    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    The App class is the main entry point for the JavaFX application.
    ApplicationNavigationController
    The ApplicationNavigationController class handles navigation between different views (Home, User, Movie) in the JavaFX application.
    ConnectionFactory
    The ConnectionFactory class is responsible for creating and providing a database connection using configuration values loaded from a .env file.
    CPFValidator
    Utility class for validating Brazilian CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas FÃ­sicas) numbers.
    CrudRepository<T>
    A generic interface that defines basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for a repository managing entities of type T.
    FormMovieComponent
    FormMovieComponent is responsible for building and managing the movie form UI in a JavaFX application.
    HomeController
    Controller class for the Home view in a JavaFX application.
    ImageUtils
    Utility class for converting images between JavaFX and byte array formats.
    JobPosition
     
    Movie
     
    MovieController
    Controller class for managing movie-related UI actions in the application.
    MovieDAO
    This class connects to the database and provides methods to insert, update, delete, retrieve, and list Movie records.
    MovieService
    Service class responsible for handling movie creation, update, and deletion logic.
    PopUp
    The PopUp class provides a static method to display animated notification messages within a JavaFX AnchorPane.
    User
     
    UserController
    The UserController class is responsible for handling the logic related to the User view in the application.
    UserDAO
    This class connects to the database and provides methods to insert, update, delete, retrieve, and list User records.
    UserFormComponent
    The UserFormComponent class is responsible for dynamically building user forms in the interface.
    UserService
    Service class responsible for handling business logic related to User operations, including validation and interaction with the UserDAO.
    ViewMovieComponent
    This class is responsible for displaying a list of movies in a scrollable UI component.
